title: Running a fund, Macro, and Bitcoin's Future with Steve
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente speaks with Steve, GP of Sats Capital for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well! 


 Newsletter: blockwareintelligence.com
